alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 03 at 2:03PM MDT until April 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Total snow accumulations of 15 to 25 inches, 7 to 15 inches in far western Custer County. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph Tuesday into Wednesday. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills, the Southern Black Hills, the Custer County Plains, the Fall River County Plains, Oglala Lakota County and the Hermosa Foot Hills. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Pine Ridge Reservation. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means the combination of snow, blowing snow, and strong winds will create dangerous whiteout conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Fall River; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Southern Black Hills; Southern Foot Hills
